alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 2:01PM AKST until December 17 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to 1 mile or less at times. The strong winds will blow the recent heavy snowfall around and cause snow drifts to form in some locations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
